TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ScrollBarButtonType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the button clicked by a user in the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ScrollBarButtonType enumeration is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ButtonType%2A> property, and allows the developer to determine what type of scrollbar button the end-user clicked on.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarButtonType LargeDecrement = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The scroll view was decreased by a large decrement, by clicking the area beneath a scrolling thumb for a vertical scrollbar, or to the left of a scrolling thumb for a horizontal scrollbar.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarButtonType LargeIncrement = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The scroll view was increased by a large increment, by clicking the area above a scrolling thumb for a vertical scrollbar, or to the right of a scrolling thumb for a horizontal scrollbar.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarButtonType SmallDecrement = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A down or left arrow button was clicked to decrease the scroll view by a small decrement.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarButtonType SmallIncrement = int32(2)

Docs.summary: An up or right arrow button was clicked to increase the scroll view by a small increment.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarButtonType ThumbTracker = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The tracker button (also known as the scrollbar thumb) was clicked.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarButtonType ZoomReset = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The zoom or reset button was clicked.
